channel.title: 🏢 University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Flex-MoE: Modeling Arbitrary Modality Combination via the Flexible Mixture-of-Experts
item.description: Flex-MoE: A novel framework flexibly handles arbitrary modality combinations in multimodal learning, even with missing data, achieving robust performance.
